Articles.Content:
hi,

I installed the mechjeb mod by copying the content of the "it's free" folder in GameData.

But I can't see any mechjeb item in the 'command and control' group in my hangar. Am I missing something?

NB: I am interested in visualizing the deltaV of my missile at construction time: am I using the right mod at all?
Leave it. I went for KER, does the job perfectly.
